content: In https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89090#issuecomment-926211476, @Vadim Petrochenkov suggests forbidding bare traits in edition 2021 during resolution instead of during lowering. Can you provide some pointers on where is the most appropriate place to do that?
The core change is to remove traits and trait aliases from PathSource::is_expected for PathSource::Type.
Some additional changes to add diagnostic suggestions like "consider replacing this path::to::Trait with dyn path::to::Trait" may also be required.
